paws 0.1.10

Bulk update custom inventory items on one more instance

Source: R/ssm_operations.R
ssm_put_inventory.Rd

Bulk update custom inventory items on one more instance. The request adds an inventory item, if it doesn't already exist, or updates an inventory item, if it does exist.

ssm_put_inventory(InstanceId, Items)

Arguments

InstanceId

[required] An instance ID where you want to add or update inventory items.
Items

[required] The inventory items that you want to add or update on instances.

Request syntax

svc$put_inventory(
  InstanceId = "string",
  Items = list(
    list(
      TypeName = "string",
      SchemaVersion = "string",
      CaptureTime = "string",
      ContentHash = "string",
      Content = list(
        list(
          "string"
        )
      ),
      Context = list(
        "string"
      )
    )
  )
)
